title: sys-clk-Overlay
author: Sun-Research-University
description: Editor for your sys-clk configuration using ovl-loader
details: Edit your sys-clk configuration using a Tesla Overlay.
changelog:
1.1

Updated to the most recent libtesla
You can now go to the previous value using X or dpad left and well as going to the next value with dpad right
Better transitions between games
Lots of bug fixes
